short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension that allows you to login to your MyRead account and truly construct your blog as you go!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: MyRead Extension allows you to add an extension to your personal blog without entering the actual website. It will autofill the URL of the current page and allow you fill in the title, description, image and category of the post. You will then be able to submit the post to your profile.
